39  using namespace std;

41 
42  void PlanetEphemeris::readASCIIheader(string filename)
43  throw(Exception)
44  {
45  try
46  {
47  // open the file
48  ifstream strm;
49  strm.open(filename.c_str());
50  if(!strm)
51  {
52  Exception e("Failed to open input file " + filename + ". Abort.");
53  GPSTK_THROW(e);
54  }
55 
56  // clear existing data
57  constants.clear();
58 
59  // read the file one line at a time, process depending on the value of group
60  int group=0,n=0; // n will count lines/items within a group
61  string line,word;
62  vector<string> const_names; // Temporary - name,value stored in map constants
63  while(1)
64  {
65  getline(strm,line);
66  stripTrailing(line,'\r');
67 
68  // catch new groups
69  if(line.substr(0,5) == "GROUP")
70  {
71  word = stripFirstWord(line);
72  group = asInt(stripFirstWord(line));
73  n = 0; // n will count lines/items within a group
74  continue;
75  }
76 
77  // skip blank lines
78  stripLeading(line," ");
79  if(line.empty())
80  {
81  if(strm.eof() || !strm.good()) break; // if the last line is blank
82  else continue;
83  }
84 
85  // process entire line at once
86  // first line (no GROUP)
87  if(group == 0)
88  {
89  word = stripFirstWord(line);
90  word = stripFirstWord(line); // ignore KSIZE
91  word = stripFirstWord(line);
92  if(word == "NCOEFF=")
93  {
94  Ncoeff = asInt(stripFirstWord(line));
95  continue;
96  }
97  else
98  {
99  Exception e("Confused on the first line - 3rd word is not NCOEFF=");
100  GPSTK_THROW(e);
101  }
102  }
103  // GROUP 1010
104  else if(group == 1010)
105  {
106  if(n > 2)
107  { // this should not happen
108  Exception e("Too many labels under GROUP 1010");
109  GPSTK_THROW(e);
110  }
111  else
112  {
113  stripTrailing(line," ");
114  label[n++] = line;
115  continue;
116  }
117  }
118  // GROUP 1030
119  else if(group == 1030)
120  {
121  // start and stop times. These are meaningless here, because they will be
122  // determined by the data that follows this header, and so are meaningful
123  // only in the binary file.
124  startJD = for2doub(stripFirstWord(line));
125  endJD = for2doub(stripFirstWord(line));
126  // interval in days covered by each block of coefficients
127  interval = for2doub(stripFirstWord(line));
128  }
129  // GROUP 1070 - end-of-header
130  else if(group == 1070)
131  {
132  break;
133  }
134 
135  // process the line one (whitespace-separated) word at a time
136  while(!line.empty())
137  {
138  word = stripFirstWord(line);
139 
140  if(group == 1040)
141  {
142  if(n++ == 0)
143  {
144  Nconst = asInt(word);
145  }
146  else
147  {
148  const_names.push_back(word);
149  }
150  }
151  else if(group == 1041)
152  {
153  if(n++ == 0)
154  {
155  if(Nconst != asInt(word))
156  {
157  Exception e("Nconst does not match N in GROUP 1041 : " +
158  asString(Nconst) + " != " + word);
159  GPSTK_THROW(e);
160  }
161  }
162  else
163  constants[const_names[n-2]] = for2doub(word);
164  }
165  else if(group == 1050)
166  {
167  if(n < 13)
168  {
169  c_offset[n] = asInt(word);
170  }
171  else if(n < 26)
172  {
173  c_ncoeff[n-13] = asInt(word);
174  }
175  else
176  {
177  c_nsets[n-26] = asInt(word);
178  }
179  n++;
180  }
181  else
182  {
183  Exception e("Confused about GROUP : " + asString(group));
184  GPSTK_THROW(e);
185  }
186  } // end loop over words
187 
188  if(strm.eof() || !strm.good()) break; // if the last line is not blank
189 
190  } // end read loop over lines
191 
192  strm.clear();
193  strm.close();
194 
195  // test that we got a full header
196  if(group != 1070)
197  {
198  Exception e("Premature end of header");
199  GPSTK_THROW(e);
200  }
201 
202  // EphemerisNumber != -1 means the header is complete
203  EphemerisNumber = int(constants["DENUM"]);
204 
205  // clear the data arrays
206  store.clear();
207  }
208  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
209  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
210  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
211 
212  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readASCIIheader()'
213 
214 
215  int PlanetEphemeris::readASCIIdata(vector<string>& filenames)
216  throw(Exception)
217  {
218  try
219  {
220  size_t i;
221 
222  if(filenames.size() == 0) return 0;
223 
224  // read the files, in any order; the data map will be sorted on time
225  for(i=0; i<filenames.size(); i++)
226  {
227  int iret = readASCIIdata(filenames[i]);
228  if(iret) return iret;
229  }
230 
231  // set the start and stop times in the header
232  map<double,vector<double> >::iterator it = store.begin();
233  startJD = it->second[0];
234  it = store.end(); it--;
235  endJD = it->second[1];
236 
237  // Mod the header labels to reflect the new time limits
238  ostringstream oss;
239  oss << "Start Epoch: JED= " << fixed << setw(10) << setprecision(1) << startJD
240  << printTime(MJD(startJD - MJD_TO_JD), " %4Y %b %2d %02H:%02M:%02S");
241  label[1] = leftJustify(oss.str(),81);
242  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
243  oss << "Final Epoch: JED= " << fixed << setw(10) << setprecision(1) << endJD
244  << printTime(MJD(endJD - MJD_TO_JD), " %4Y %b %2d %02H:%02M:%02S");
245  label[2] = leftJustify(oss.str(),81);
246 
247  return 0;
248  }
249  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
250  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
251  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
252 
253  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readASCIIdata()'
254 
255 
256  int PlanetEphemeris::readASCIIdata(string filename)
257  throw(Exception)
258  {
259  try
260  {
261  if(EphemerisNumber < 0)
262  {
263  Exception e("readASCIIdata called before header read");
264  GPSTK_THROW(e);
265  }
266 
267  int iret=0;
268  string line,word;
269  ifstream strm;
270 
271  // open the file
272  strm.open(filename.c_str());
273  if(!strm)
274  {
275  Exception e("Could not open file " + filename);
276  GPSTK_THROW(e);
277  }
278 
279  // expect this many lines per record
280  int nmax = Ncoeff/3 + (Ncoeff % 3 ? 1 : 0);
281 
282  // loop over lines in the file
283  int ntot=0; // counts the total number of lines
284  int n=0; // counts the lines within a set of coefficients
285  int nc=0; // count coefficients within a record
286  int rec;
287  vector<double> data_vector;
288  while(1)
289  {
290  getline(strm,line);
291  stripTrailing(line,'\r');
292 
293  if(line.empty())
294  {
295  if(strm.eof()) break;
296  if(!strm.good()) { iret = -1; break; }
297  continue;
298  }
299 
300  if(n == 0)
301  {
302  rec = asInt(stripFirstWord(line)); // 1st word is the record number
303  int ncc = asInt(stripFirstWord(line)); // 2nd word is ncoeff
304  if(ncc != Ncoeff)
305  {
306  Exception e("readASCIIdata finds conflicting sizes in header ("
307  + asString(Ncoeff) + ") and data (" + asString(ncc) + ") in file "
308  + filename + " at line #" + asString(ntot));
309  GPSTK_THROW(e);
310  }
311  nc = 0;
312  }
313  else
314  {
315  for(int j=0; j<3; j++)
316  {
317  double coeff = for2doub(stripFirstWord(line));
318  nc++;
319  data_vector.push_back(coeff);
320  if(nc >= Ncoeff)
321  {
322  vector<double> dtemp=data_vector;
323  store[data_vector[0]] = dtemp;
324  data_vector.clear();
325  break;
326  }
327  }
328  }
329 
330  if(strm.eof()) break;
331  if(!strm.good()) { iret = -1; break; }
332 
333  if(n == nmax) n=0; else n++;
334  ntot++;
335  }
336 
337  strm.close();
338 
339  return iret;
340  }
341  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
342  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
343  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
344 
345  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readASCIIdata()'
346 
347 
348  int PlanetEphemeris::writeASCIIheader(ostream& os)
349  throw(Exception)
350  {
351  try
352  {
353  if(EphemerisNumber < 0) return -4;
354 
355  int i;
356  string str;
357  string blank(81,' '); blank += string("\n");
358  ostringstream oss;
359 
360  oss << "KSIZE= 0000 NSIZE=" << setw(5) << Ncoeff << blank;
361  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl << blank; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
362 
363  os << leftJustify("GROUP 1010",81) << endl << blank;
364  for(i=0; i<3; i++)
365  {
366  str = label[i];
367  os << leftJustify(str,81) << endl;
368  }
369  os << blank;
370 
371  os << leftJustify("GROUP 1030",81) << endl << blank;
372  oss << fixed << setprecision(2) << setw(12) << startJD
373  << setw(12) << endJD << setw(12) << interval << blank;
374  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl << blank; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
375 
376  os << leftJustify("GROUP 1040",81) << endl << blank;
377  oss << setw(6) << Nconst << blank;
378  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
379 
380  map<string,double>::const_iterator it=constants.begin();
381  for(i=0; it != constants.end(); it++,i++)
382  {
383  oss << leftJustify(" " + it->first,8);
384  if((i+1)%10 == 0)
385  {
386  oss << blank;
387  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl;
388  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
389  }
390  }
391  if(Nconst%10 != 0)
392  {
393  oss << blank;
394  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl;
395  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
396  }
397  os << blank;
398 
399  os << leftJustify("GROUP 1041",81) << endl << blank;
400  oss << setw(6) << Nconst << blank;
401  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
402 
403  for(i=0,it=constants.begin(); it != constants.end(); it++,i++)
404  {
405  oss << leftJustify(" " + doub2for(it->second,24,2),26);
406  if((i+1)%3 == 0)
407  {
408  oss << blank;
409  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl;
410  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
411  }
412  }
413  if(Nconst%3 != 0)
414  {
415  i--;
416  while((i+1)%3 != 0) { oss << leftJustify(" " + doub2for(0.0,24,2),26); i++; }
417  oss << blank;
418  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl;
419  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
420  }
421  os << blank;
422 
423  os << leftJustify("GROUP 1050",81) << endl << blank;
424  for(i=0; i<13; i++) oss << rightJustify(asString(c_offset[i]),6);
425  oss << blank; os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
426  for(i=0; i<13; i++) oss << rightJustify(asString(c_ncoeff[i]),6);
427  oss << blank; os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
428  for(i=0; i<13; i++) oss << rightJustify(asString(c_nsets[i]),6);
429  oss << blank; os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl; oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
430  os << blank;
431 
432  os << leftJustify("GROUP 1070",81) << endl << blank;
433  os << blank;
434 
435  return 0;
436  }
437  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
438  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
439  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
440 
441  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::writeASCIIheader()'
442 
443 
444  int PlanetEphemeris::writeASCIIdata(ostream& os)
445  throw(Exception)
446  {
447  try
448  {
449  if(EphemerisNumber < 0) return -4;
450 
451  string blank(81,' '); blank += string("\n");
452  int i,nrec;
453  ostringstream oss;
454 
455  map<double,vector<double> >::iterator jt;
456  for(nrec=1,jt=store.begin(); jt != store.end(); jt++,nrec++)
457  {
458  os << setw(6) << nrec << setw(6) << Ncoeff << " " << endl;
459  for(i=0; i<Ncoeff; i++)
460  {
461  oss << leftJustify(" " + doub2for(jt->second[i],24,2),26);
462  if((i+1)%3 == 0)
463  {
464  oss << blank;
465  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl;
466  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
467  }
468  }
469  if(Ncoeff % 3 != 0)
470  {
471  i--;
472  while((i+1)%3 != 0)
473  {
474  oss << leftJustify(" " + doub2for(0.0,24,2),26);
475  i++;
476  }
477  oss << blank;
478  os << leftJustify(oss.str(),81) << endl;
479  oss.seekp(ios_base::beg);
480  }
481  }
482 
483  // TD clear the array after writing
484  //store.clear();
485 
486  return 0;
487  }
488  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
489  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
490  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
491 
492  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::writeASCIIdata(ostream& os) '
493 
494 
495  int PlanetEphemeris::writeBinaryFile(string filename)
496  throw(Exception)
497  {
498  try
499  {
500  int recLength;
501  size_t i;
502  string str;
503 
504  if(EphemerisNumber <= 0) return -4;
505 
506  // open the output file
507  ofstream strm;
508  strm.open(filename.c_str(),ios::out | ios::binary);
509  if(!strm)
510  {
511  Exception e("Failed to open output file " + filename + ". Abort.");
512  GPSTK_THROW(e);
513  }
514 
515  // write the header records: two of them, both of length Ncoeff*sizeof(double)
516  // the structure and ordering taken from the JPL code
517  recLength = 0;
518 
519  // first header record -------------------------------------------------
520  // 1. 3 labels each of length 84
521  for(i=0; i<3; i++)
522  {
523  str = label[i];
524  writeBinary(strm,leftJustify(str,84).c_str(),84);
525  recLength += 84;
526  }
527 
528  // 2. 400 keys from the const array, each of length 6
529  map<string,double>::const_iterator it=constants.begin();
530  for(i=0; i<400; i++)
531  {
532  if(it != constants.end())
533  {
534  str = it->first;
535  writeBinary(strm,leftJustify(str,6).c_str(),6);
536  it++;
537  }
538  else
539  writeBinary(strm," ",6);
540  recLength += 6;
541  }
542 
543  // 3. the three times
544  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&startJD,sizeof(double));
545  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&endJD,sizeof(double));
546  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&interval,sizeof(double));
547  recLength += 3*sizeof(double);
548 
549  // 4. Ncoeff
550  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&Ncoeff,sizeof(int));
551  recLength += sizeof(int);
552 
553  // 5. AU and EMRAT
554  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&constants["AU"],sizeof(double));
555  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&constants["EMRAT"],sizeof(double));
556  recLength += 2*sizeof(double);
557 
558  // 6. c_arrays for the first 12 planets
559  for(i=0; i<12; i++) {
560  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&c_offset[i],sizeof(int));
561  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&c_ncoeff[i],sizeof(int));
562  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&c_nsets[i],sizeof(int));
563  recLength += 3*sizeof(int);
564  }
565 
566  // 7. DENUM
567  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&constants["DENUM"],sizeof(double));
568  recLength += sizeof(double);
569 
570  // 8. c_arrays for libration
571  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&c_offset[12],sizeof(int));
572  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&c_ncoeff[12],sizeof(int));
573  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&c_nsets[12],sizeof(int));
574  recLength += 3*sizeof(int);
575 
576  // 9. pad
577  char c=' ';
578  for(i=0; i < Ncoeff*sizeof(double) - recLength; i++)
579  writeBinary(strm,&c,1);
580 
581  // second header record -------------------------------------------------
582  // the second header record: 400 values from the const array
583  double z=0.0;
584  it = constants.begin();
585  for(i=0; i<400; i++)
586  {
587  if(it != constants.end())
588  {
589  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&(it->second),sizeof(double));
590  it++;
591  }
592  else
593  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&z,sizeof(double));
594  }
595  for(i=0; i < (400-Nconst)*sizeof(double); i++)
596  writeBinary(strm,&c,1);
597 
598  // data records ---------------------------------------------------------
599  // the data, in time order
600  int nrec=1;
601  map<double,vector<double> >::iterator jt;
602  for(jt=store.begin(); jt != store.end(); jt++)
603  {
604  for(i=0; i<jt->second.size(); i++)
605  writeBinary(strm,(char *)&jt->second[i],sizeof(double));
606  nrec++;
607  }
608 
609  // TD after writing it out, clear the store array
610  //store.clear();
611 
612  strm.clear();
613  strm.close();
614 
615  return 0;
616  }
617  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
618  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
619  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
620 
621  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::writeBinaryFile()'
622 
623 
624  int PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryFile(string filename)
625  throw(Exception)
626  {
627  try
628  {
629  int iret;
630  readBinaryHeader(filename);
631  iret = readBinaryData(true); // true: store ALL the data in map
632 
633  istrm.clear();
634  istrm.close();
635 
636  return iret;
637  }
638  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
639  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
640  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
641 
642  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryFile(string filename)'
643 
644 
645  int PlanetEphemeris::initializeWithBinaryFile(string filename)
646  throw(Exception)
647  {
648  try
649  {
650  int iret;
651 
652  readBinaryHeader(filename);
653  iret = readBinaryData(false); // false: don't store data in map
654  if(iret == 0)
655  {
656  // EphemerisNumber == -1 means the header has not been read
657  // EphemerisNumber == 0 means the fileposMap has not been read (binary)
658  // EphemerisNumber == constants["DENUM"] means object has been initialized
659  // (binary file), or header read (ASCII file)
660  EphemerisNumber = int(constants["DENUM"]);
661  }
662 
663  return iret;
664  }
665  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
666  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
667  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
668 
669  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::initializeWithBinaryFile(string filename) '
670 
671 
672  // return 0 ok, or (from seekToJD)
673  // -1 out of range : input time is before the first time in file
674  // -2 out of range : input time is after the last time in file, or in a gap
675  // -3 stream is not open or not good, or EOF was found prematurely
676  // -4 EphemerisNumber is not defined
677  // For -3,-4 : initializeWithBinaryFile() has not been called, or reading failed.
678  int PlanetEphemeris::computeState( double tt,
679  PlanetEphemeris::Planet target,
680  PlanetEphemeris::Planet center,
681  double PV[6],
682  bool kilometers)
683  throw(Exception)
684  {
685  try
686  {
687  int iret,i;
688 
689  // initialize
690  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PV[i] = 0.0;
691 
692  // trivial; return
693  if(target == center) return 0;
694 
695  // get the right record from the file
696  iret = seekToJD(tt);
697  if(iret) return iret;
698 
699  // compute Nutations or Librations
700  if(target == Nutations || target == Librations)
701  {
702  computeState(tt, target==Nutations ? NUTATIONS : LIBRATIONS, PV);
703  return 0;
704  }
705 
706  // define computeID's for target and center
707  computeID TARGET,CENTER;
708 
709  if(target <= Sun) TARGET = computeID(target-1);
710  else if(target == SolarSystemBarycenter) TARGET = NONE;
711  else if(target == EarthMoonBarycenter) TARGET = EMBARY;
712  // (Nutations and Librations are done above)
713  if(center <= Sun) CENTER = computeID(center-1);
714  else if(center == SolarSystemBarycenter) CENTER = NONE;
715  else if(center == EarthMoonBarycenter) CENTER = EMBARY;
716 
717  // Earth and Moon need special treatment
718  double PVMOON[6],PVEMBARY[6],Eratio,Mratio;
719 
720  // special cases of Earth AND Moon: Moon result is always geocentric
721  if(target == Earth && center == Moon) TARGET = NONE;
722  if(center == Earth && target == Moon) CENTER = NONE;
723 
724  // special cases of Earth OR Moon, but not both:
725  if((target == Earth && center != Moon) || (center == Earth && target != Moon))
726  {
727  Eratio = 1.0/(1.0 + constants["EMRAT"]);
728  computeState(tt, MOON, PVMOON);
729  }
730  if((target == Moon && center != Earth) || (center == Moon && target != Earth))
731  {
732  Mratio = constants["EMRAT"]/(1.0 + constants["EMRAT"]);
733  computeState(tt, EMBARY, PVEMBARY);
734  }
735 
736  // compute states for target and center
737  double PVTARGET[6],PVCENTER[6];
738  computeState(tt, TARGET, PVTARGET);
739  computeState(tt, CENTER, PVCENTER);
740 
741  // handle the Earth/Moon special cases
742  // convert from E-M barycenter to Earth
743  if(target == Earth && center != Moon)
744  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PVTARGET[i] -= PVMOON[i]*Eratio;
745  if(center == Earth && target != Moon)
746  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PVCENTER[i] -= PVMOON[i]*Eratio;
747 
748  if(target == Moon && center != Earth)
749  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PVTARGET[i] = PVEMBARY[i] + PVTARGET[i]*Mratio;
750  if(center == Moon && target != Earth)
751  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PVCENTER[i] = PVEMBARY[i] + PVCENTER[i]*Mratio;
752 
753  // final result
754  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PV[i] = PVTARGET[i] - PVCENTER[i];
755 
756  if(!kilometers) {
757  double AU = constants["AU"];
758  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PV[i] /= AU;
759  }
760 
761  return 0;
762  }
763  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
764  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
765  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
766 
767  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::computeState()'
768 
769 
770  void PlanetEphemeris::writeBinary(ofstream& strm, const char *ptr, size_t size)
771  throw(Exception)
772  {
773  try
774  {
775  strm.write(ptr,size);
776  if(!strm.good())
777  {
778  Exception e("Stream error");
779  GPSTK_THROW(e);
780  }
781  }
782  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
783  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
784  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
785 
786  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::writeBinary()'
787 
788 
789  void PlanetEphemeris::readBinary(char *ptr, size_t size)
790  throw(Exception)
791  {
792  try
793  {
794  istrm.read(ptr,size);
795  if(istrm.eof() || !istrm.good())
796  {
797  Exception e("Stream error or premature EOF");
798  GPSTK_THROW(e);
799  }
800  }
801  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
802  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
803  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
804 
805  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readBinary()'
806 
807 
808  void PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryHeader(std::string filename)
809  throw(Exception)
810  {
811  try
812  {
813  int j, recLength;
814  size_t i;
815  char buffer[100];
816  double AU,EMRAT;
817  string word;
818 
819  // open the input binary file
820  istrm.open(filename.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
821  if(!istrm)
822  {
823  Exception e("Failed to open input binary file " + filename + ". Abort.");
824  GPSTK_THROW(e);
825  }
826 
827  // initialize
828  EphemerisNumber = -1;
829  constants.clear();
830  store.clear();
831  recLength = 0;
832 
833  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
834  // read the first header record
835  // 1. 3 labels each of length 84
836  for(i=0; i<3; i++)
837  {
838  readBinary(buffer,84); //istrm.read(buffer,84);
839  recLength += 84;
840  buffer[84] = '\0';
841  label[i] = stripTrailing(stripLeading(buffer," ")," ");
842  }
843 
844  // 2. 400 keys from the const array, each of length 6
845  vector<string> consts_names;
846  buffer[6] = '\0';
847  for(i=0; i<400; i++)
848  {
849  readBinary(buffer,6);
850  recLength += 6;
851  word = stripLeading(string(buffer));
852  if(!word.empty())
853  {
854  consts_names.push_back(word);
855  }
856  }
857  Nconst = consts_names.size();
858 
859  // 3. the three times
860  readBinary((char *)&startJD,sizeof(double));
861  readBinary((char *)&endJD,sizeof(double));
862  readBinary((char *)&interval,sizeof(double));
863  recLength += 3*sizeof(double);
864 
865  // 4. Ncoeff
866  readBinary((char *)&Ncoeff,sizeof(int));
867  recLength += sizeof(int);
868 
869  // 5. AU and EMRAT
870  buffer[sizeof(double)] = '\0';
871  readBinary((char *)&AU,sizeof(double));
872  recLength += sizeof(double);
873 
874  readBinary((char *)&EMRAT,sizeof(double));
875  recLength += sizeof(double);
876 
877  // 6. c_arrays for the first 12 planets
878  for(i=0; i<12; i++)
879  {
880  readBinary((char *)&c_offset[i],sizeof(int));
881  readBinary((char *)&c_ncoeff[i],sizeof(int));
882  readBinary((char *)&c_nsets[i],sizeof(int));
883  recLength += 3*sizeof(int);
884  }
885 
886  // 7. DENUM
887  double denum;
888  readBinary((char *)&denum,sizeof(double));
889  recLength += sizeof(double);
890 
891  // 8. c_arrays for libration
892  readBinary((char *)&c_offset[12],sizeof(int));
893  readBinary((char *)&c_ncoeff[12],sizeof(int));
894  readBinary((char *)&c_nsets[12],sizeof(int));
895  recLength += 3*sizeof(int);
896 
897  // 9. pad - records are padded to be the same length as the data records b/c
898  // JPL does it (for Fortran reasons) - not necessary
899  for(i=0; i < Ncoeff*sizeof(double)-recLength; i++)
900  readBinary(buffer,1);
901 
902  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
903  // the second header record: 400 values from the const array
904  double d;
905  for(j=0; j<400; j++)
906  {
907  readBinary((char *)&d,sizeof(double));
908  if(j < Nconst)
909  {
910  constants[stripTrailing(consts_names[j])] = d;
911  }
912  }
913  // pad
914  for(i=0; i < (400-Nconst)*sizeof(double); i++)
915  readBinary(buffer,1);
916 
917  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
918  // test the header
919  if(denum == constants["DENUM"])
920  {
921 
922  // EphemerisNumber == -1 means the header has not been read
923  // EphemerisNumber == 0 means the fileposMap has not been read (binary)
924  // EphemerisNumber == constants["DENUM"] means object has been initialized
925  // (binary file), or header read (ASCII file)
926  EphemerisNumber = 0;
927 
928  // clear the data arrays
929  store.clear();
930  }
931  else
932  {
933  cout << "DENUM (" << denum << ") does not equal the array value ("
934  << constants["DENUM"] << ")"<<endl;
935  }
936  }
937  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
938  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
939  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
940 
941  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryHeader(std::string filename) '
942 
943 
944  int PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryData(bool save)
945  throw(Exception)
946  {
947  try
948  {
949  // has the header been read?
950  if(EphemerisNumber == -1) return -4;
951 
952  // read the data, optionally storing it all; fill the file position map
953  int iret=-1,nrec=1;
954  double prev=0.0;
955  vector<double> data_vector;
956  while(!istrm.eof() && istrm.good())
957  {
958  long filepos = istrm.tellg();
959  iret = readBinaryRecord(data_vector);
960  if(iret == -2) { iret = 0; break; } // EOF
961  if(iret) break;
962 
963  // if saving all in store, add it here
964  if(save)
965  store[data_vector[0]] = data_vector;
966 
967  // put the first record in coefficients array
968  if(nrec == 1)
969  coefficients = data_vector;
970 
971  // build the positions map
972  fileposMap[data_vector[0]] = filepos;
973 
974  if(nrec > 1 && data_vector[0] != prev)
975  {
976  ostringstream oss;
977  oss << "ERROR: found gap in data at " << nrec << fixed << setprecision(6)
978  << " : prev end = " << prev << " != new beg = " << data_vector[0];
979  Exception e(oss.str());
980  GPSTK_THROW(e);
981  }
982 
983  // remember the end time for next record
984  prev = data_vector[1];
985 
986  // count records
987  nrec++;
988  }
989 
990  istrm.clear();
991 
992  return iret;
993  }
994  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
995  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
996  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
997 
998  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryData(bool save)'
999 
1000 
1001  // return 0 ok, or
1002  // -3 stream is not open or not good
1003  // -4 EphemerisNumber is not defined
1004  // For -3,-4 : initializeWithBinaryFile() has not been called, or reading failed.
1005  int PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryRecord(vector<double>& data_vector)
1006  throw(Exception)
1007  {
1008  try
1009  {
1010  if(!istrm) return -3;
1011  if(istrm.eof() || !istrm.good()) return -3;
1012  if(EphemerisNumber <= -1) return -4;
1013 
1014  data_vector.clear();
1015 
1016  double d;
1017  for(int i=0; i<Ncoeff; i++)
1018  {
1019  istrm.read((char *)&d,sizeof(double)); // don't use readBinary(), to catch EOF
1020  if(istrm.eof()) return -2;
1021  if(!istrm.good()) return -3;
1022  data_vector.push_back(d);
1023  }
1024 
1025  return 0;
1026  }
1027  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
1028  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
1029  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
1030 
1031  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::readBinaryRecord()'
1032 
1033  // return 0 ok, or
1034  // -1 out of range : input time is before the first time in file
1035  // -2 out of range : input time is after the last time in file, or in a gap
1036  // -3 stream is not open or not good, or EOF was found prematurely
1037  // -4 EphemerisNumber is not defined
1038  // For -3,-4 : initializeWithBinaryFile() has not been called, or reading failed.
1039  int PlanetEphemeris::seekToJD(double JD)
1040  throw(Exception)
1041  {
1042  try
1043  {
1044  if(!istrm) return -3;
1045  if(istrm.eof() || !istrm.good()) return -3;
1046  if(EphemerisNumber != int(constants["DENUM"])) return -4;
1047 
1048  if(coefficients[0] <= JD && JD <= coefficients[1]) return 0;
1049 
1050  map<double,long>::const_iterator it; // key >= input
1051  it = fileposMap.lower_bound(JD); // it points to first element with JD <= time
1052 
1053  if(it == fileposMap.begin() && JD < it->first)
1054  return -1; // failure: JD is before the first record
1055 
1056  if(it == fileposMap.end() // if beyond the found record, go to previous;
1057  || JD < it->first) it--; // but beware the "lower_bound found the =" case
1058 
1059  istrm.seekg(it->second,ios_base::beg); // get the record
1060  int iret = readBinaryRecord(coefficients);
1061  if(iret == -2) iret = -3; // this means EOF during data read
1062  if(iret) return iret; // reading failed
1063 
1064  if(JD > coefficients[1])
1065  return -2; // failure: JD is after the last record, or
1066  // JD is in a gap between records
1067  return 0;
1068  }
1069  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
1070  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
1071  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
1072 
1073  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::seekToJD()'
1074 
1075 
1076  void PlanetEphemeris::computeState(double tt,
1077  PlanetEphemeris::computeID which,
1078  double PV[6])
1079  throw(Exception)
1080  {
1081  try {
1082  int i,j,i0,ncomp;
1083 
1084  for(i=0; i<6; i++) PV[i]=0.0;
1085  if(which == NONE) return;
1086 
1087  double T,Tbeg,Tspan,Tspan0;
1088  Tbeg = coefficients[0];
1089  Tspan0 = Tspan = coefficients[1] - coefficients[0];
1090  i0 = c_offset[which]-1; // index of first coefficient in array
1091  ncomp = (which == NUTATIONS ? 2 : 3); // number of components returned
1092 
1093  // if more than one set, find the right set
1094  if(c_nsets[which] > 1)
1095  {
1096  Tspan /= double(c_nsets[which]);
1097  for(j=c_nsets[which]; j>0; j--)
1098  {
1099  Tbeg = coefficients[0] + double(j-1)*Tspan;
1100  if(tt > Tbeg) // == with j==1 is the default
1101  {
1102  i0 += (j-1)*ncomp*c_ncoeff[which];
1103  break;
1104  }
1105  }
1106  }
1107 
1108  // normalized time
1109  T = 2.0*(tt-Tbeg)/Tspan - 1.0;
1110 
1111  // interpolate
1112  unsigned int N=c_ncoeff[which];
1113  vector<double> C(N,0.0); // Chebyshev
1114  vector<double> U(N,0.0); // derivative of Chebyshev
1115  for(i=0; i<ncomp; i++) // loop over components
1116  {
1117 
1118  // seed the Chebyshev recursions
1119  C[0] = 1; C[1] = T; //C[2] = 2*T*T-1;
1120  U[0] = 0; U[1] = 1; //U[2] = 4*T;
1121 
1122  // generate the Chebyshevs
1123  for(unsigned int k=2; k<N; k++)
1124  {
1125  C[k] = 2*T*C[k-1] - C[k-2];
1126  U[k] = 2*T*U[k-1] + 2*C[k-1] - U[k-2];
1127  }
1128 
1129  // compute P and V
1130  // done above PV[i] = PV[i+3] = 0.0;
1131  for(j=N-1; j>-1; j--) // POS
1132  PV[i] += coefficients[i0+j+i*N] * C[j];
1133  for(j=N-1; j>0; j--) // j>0 b/c U[0]=0 // VEL
1134  PV[i+ncomp] += coefficients[i0+j+i*N] * U[j];
1135 
1136  // convert velocity to 'per day'
1137  PV[i+ncomp] *= 2*double(c_nsets[which])/Tspan0;
1138  }
1139  }
1140  catch(Exception& e) { GPSTK_RETHROW(e); }
1141  catch(exception& e) { Exception E("std except: "+string(e.what())); GPSTK_THROW(E); }
1142  catch(...) { Exception e("Unknown exception"); GPSTK_THROW(e); }
1143 
1144  } // End of method 'PlanetEphemeris::computeState()'
1145 
1146 } // End of namespace gpstk
